name: Robots like cats
description:
Every day is full of routine for the cute robot from the fair. On a new day, the robot meets a furry friend, which the employer clearly does not like.

However, no one cares about the problem when a meteor demolishes the fair, taking away a robot, a fortune teller and local cats to a space island.

You have to find and save the cats. Flirt with a fortune teller, as well as defeat a terrible camera.

Controlt: WASD and F . Have a nice game jam to everyone
